algorithm.name: TIKATEXT
algorithm.description: The Apache Tika text detection component.

properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum confidence score which must be met or exceeded. Detections below this threshold are silently discarded.

properties.name: TAGGING_FILE
properties.description: Name of a JSON file (in the plugin's config folder) that describes a tag hierarchy to be used on the full text returned from Tika text detection.

properties.name: STORE_METADATA
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to store metadata as a separate track detection.

properties.name: TRIM_TEXT
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to trim out trailing whitespace in extracted text.

properties.name: LIST_ALL_PAGES
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to store each page as a track, even if no text is extracted.

properties.name: MIN_CHARS_FOR_LANGUAGE_DETECTION
properties.description: Specifies minimum length of detected text before language filtering is applied.

actions.name: TIKA TEXT DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika text detection algorithm using the default parameters.
